com.fincons.mqtt.client.service

Class SessionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fincons.mqtt.client.service.SessionService

  • public class SessionService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class instantiates an MQTT Client that can be used to communicate with an MQTT server. The configuration parameters about the MQTT Broker Server and all the connection options are specified in an external configuration file.
    Author:
    leonardo.straniero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connect()
      Connects to an MQTT server using the specified options.
      static SessionService getInstance()
      Return the single instance of the SessionService class respecting the singleton pattern and providing an optimized handing of the connections with the Broker Server.
      org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient getMqttClient()
      Gets the instance of the MQTT Client created by the SessionService class.
      boolean isConnected()
      Specify if the client is currently connected to the server

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SessionService getInstance()
        Return the single instance of the SessionService class respecting the singleton pattern and providing an optimized handing of the connections with the Broker Server. This method call internally the class constructor when the class is used the first time.
        Returns:
        the instance of SessionService

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        Connects to an MQTT server using the specified options. N.B. The disconnect operation is handled by the keep-alive mechanisms then is not provided a disconnect() method.
        Returns:
        the boolean flag that specifies if the client is currently connected to the server.

      • getMqttClient

        public org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttClient getMqttClient()
        Gets the instance of the MQTT Client created by the SessionService class.
        Returns:
        the instance of MqttClient

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Specify if the client is currently connected to the server
        Returns:
        true if the client is connected to the server, false otherwise.
